entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introduce IResettable to streamline object pool usage #77870
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce an [Experimental] attribute to complement [Obsolete] #77869
  • Unify type name parser in linker once is in runtime #77868
  • ValueTaskSourceAsTask IAsyncStateMachineBox implementation? #77866
  • ReadyToRun: The type initializer for 'System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.Converter' threw an exception. #77862
  • Windows Service Error 1053 #77861
  • [release/6.0] tvOS test queues failing a lot #77855
    6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] CI Android x86 Mono failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests #77853
    6.0.x
  • Consider Android development Codespace #77851
    8.0.0
  • Per @ahsonkhan's feedback, guidelines for `Try`-methods require representing one and only one failure mode when returning `false`, and otherwise throwing exceptions is perfectly acceptable. As such, it would not be possible to add such a method, at least not one that doesn't violate expectations as ruled out in the original post. #77849
  • System.IO.Hashing's ref is missing a csproj #77846
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Run a few library tests on nodejs, on the `runtime` pipeline #77839
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Stringbuilder.Replace(ROS oldValue, ROS newValue, int index, int count) #77837
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests fails in Debug build #77836
    8.0.0
  • Blazor webassembly loading error: CompileError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): expected magic word 00 61 73 6d, found 3c 21 44 4f @+0 #77842
  • File.Copy: Clone file when possible on MacOS #77835
    Future
  • Regressions in SciMark2.kernel #77841
    Future
  • NetworkChange NetworkAddressChanged event throws NetworkInformationException on Android #77822
  • System.Reflection.Tests.AssemblyTests.AssemblyGetForwardedTypesLoadFailure crashes on Android #77821
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #77820
    8.0.0
  • CI failure: Unhandled timeout exception in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws #77814

Closed

  • Need way to exclude specified assemblies from automatic loading via the dependency file and not bypass AssemblyResolve #77751
  • [Analyzer Suggestion]: Simplify `ToUpper(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)` to `ToUpperInvariant()` #77863
    Future
  • MEL logs only first element from array passed #77335
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.TryNonEnumeratedElementAt, Enumerable.TryNonEnumeratedFindIndex #77754
  • Improve hosting test/dev experience #52220
    Future
  • Assembly.GetType doesn't support AssemblyQualified names. #56776
    Future
  • ResourceManager has incorrect BaseName when constructed with a Type #74918
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationErrorsException: Section or group name 'system.diagnostics' is already defined. #77369
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: More Function-Overloads which takes ReadOnlySpan<char> instead of string #77834
  • [API Proposal]: Color.FromName(ROS name) #77838
  • Ubuntu: dotnet-dump/gcdump can not dump process memory if application was compiled on windows machine #77392
    8.0.0
  • Setting `RunAOTCompilation=true` on non-wasm/non-mobile projects fails to build #77707
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Inherited internal properties are not returned via reflection #76881
    8.0.0
  • BitmapFrame: System.IO.FileFormatException: 'Unexpected property type or value.' #77824
  • [API Proposal]: Add `AssemblyBuilder.ManifestModuleBuilder` and obsolete `AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule`. #67053
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices\exceptions\simple\ParallelCrashMainThread\ParallelCrashMainThread.cmd #77790

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix STRESS_64RSLT_MUL stress mode to avoid creating unnecessary IR #77871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • Update api-review-process.md #77860
    area-Meta
  • Links to issue with more info on flaky behavior #77859
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Remove SharedFxLookup tests #77858
    area-Host
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add System.IO.Hashing ref csproj #77856
    area-System.Security
  • Fix mono arm assert with large return structs #77854
    community-contribution
  • Remove "wprintf" from PAL #77852
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Work around invalid IR with field morphing temps #77848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Propagate only BBF_COPY_PROPAGATE flags during inliner substitution #77845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use backport workflow from arcade repo #77844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix timeout in regex test #77817
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Optimize XxHash3 #77756
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Free `LOADERHANDLE` `DispatchMemberInfo` dtor #77570
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Workaround for msbuild issue in host tests #77850
    area-Host
  • Fix op_Inequality for `Vector64<T>` #77815
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Clear OpenSSL error queues before reading/writing SSL data #77772
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77620
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.12
  • Update superpmi-collect queues #77825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77438
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.12 #77750
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Always generate metadata for dynamic methods #77322
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #77260
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.12
  • Use correct container definitions in perf_slow.yml #77774
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not add null checks for boxed statics #77796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing when trying to call mono functions in a non wasm page #77501
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.1
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update release/7.0 Perf infrastructure to use Perf repo release/7.0 branch #77699
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Unify RunCrossGen2 environment variable to be set to 1 instead of "true" #77808
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid some unnecessary MemoryStream.ToArray calls #77832
    area-Meta
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Mono workloads: Fix building non-mono project when `RunAOTCompilation=true` #77762
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump tests timeout 15mins to 30mins, for .. #77819
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Fixes typos and formatting in comments #76975
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • correct code snippets #77581
    community-contribution
  • Fix ThunkGenerator build break #77816
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix wrong metadata name in test #77806
  • Update tar test data version #77785
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable phi-based jump threading when SSA updates aren't needed #77748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove empty BEGIN/END_ENTRYPOINT_* macros #77810
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [mono] Avoid returning true from RuntimeType.IsActualEnum for generic… #77763
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77734
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77619
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77605
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [Release/7.0] Issue ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #77533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77443
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77437
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Fixed FSharp crash issue #77270
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77382
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Template nits 2 #77263
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Control if invalid configuration values are swallowed or thrown #77708
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • source-build: set the properties to build for mono runtime. #77786
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Managed EventSources do not show up by default in EventPipe sessions (#75248) #77811
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.12
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Refactor ProcessStartInfoTests to use WindowsTestAccount #77804
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Avoiding Bimodal GC behavior #63408
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add explicit flushing to ProcessStartInfoTests #76610
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add FrozenDictionary/Set #77799
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}hP{re,ost}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77788
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77787
    area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project References that are not listed in assets file aren't included in deps.json #28891
  • Publish target should return the items published #28890
  • Blazor Server Apps packed into a Tool can't find static assets #28881
  • Android Release : MainPage = new NavigationPage(new ContentPage()); crashes #28880
  • .NET 6: dotnet build not creating GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig file? #28863

Closed

  • Code Coverage for RuntimeIdentifiers #28048

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28894
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28893
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28892
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28883
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the resolver to target net7 as we expect VSMac to move forward… #28879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Codeql #28877
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28875
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28876
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28858
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-CLI
  • Remove the downlevel feeds to reduce overall footprint #28860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Detect Corrupt Solution File in Dotnet Sln Add #28811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP]Introduce a shared project Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtension #28855
    Area-GenAPI
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal Question: Allow lambda conversion despite optional parameter or `params` differences #6651

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: `Task<T>` nullability covariance #3950
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Address null-conditional-assignment proposal feedback #6635
  • Warn for lambda defaults/`params` differences #6648

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extract Local Function In Lambda Produces Wrong Function Location #65222
  • Extract method inside base initializer produces method without return type #65221
  • Detection of IDE0059 with C# not working within try/catch statements #65220
  • Share synthesized delegate types with same default parameter values #65213
  • F1 on `default` in generic constraints takes to wrong documentation #65210
  • Removing empty lines in a class can remove all errors from that file #65209
    17.5 P2

Closed

  • Compiler hard crash (brought down VS). #41994
    17.5
  • The "Convert to conditional expression" refactoring is sometimes mislabeled #39260
    Backlog
  • The Simplifier doesn't remove the redundant cast from the expression #41500
    Backlog
  • Issues with error list entries with LSP pull diagnostics enabled #65172
    17.5
  • IDE0055 (Fix formatting) errors on Azure hosted build agent ubuntu-latest #65200
  • Assert in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.GetValEscape method during build #65167
  • `[Obsolete(null, error: true)]` is displayed as a warning. #65042
  • System.AccessViolationException in Symbol.ToDisplayString #64973
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33102.296 #65203
  • Name IntelliSense is showing by default #49791
    Backlog
  • "Add parameters to constructor" refactoring doesn't work with expression-bodied constructor #49112
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history #65223
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65218
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache translated imports in PEModuleBuilder #65215
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more lambda defaults/`params` tests #65214
    Area-Compilers
  • Report outlier/bad analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • Implement `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65207
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Keep starred item from IntelliCode at the top of completion list #65199
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65219
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix typo in API #65216
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Wait for Roslyn Services completes in NavigateTo Tests #65201
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove duplicate property #65185
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update bug-report.md #65217
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simplify multiple casts in 'add explicit cast'. #65182
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve title shown by 'use-conditional' in certain cases. #65197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65204
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support adding parameters to constructors with expression bodies #65194
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer decl name completion for clearly errant cases #65195
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add expanded description for lsp diagnostics #65202
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add ExternalAccess name recommender API for Pythia #65075
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch DocumentKinds to a string array #65208
    Area-IDE, Next
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reduce amount of allocated MissingMetadataTypeSymbol symbols during various lookup operations. #65046
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix extract local in base initializer #65159
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add langversion checks for lambda optional and `params` parameters #65140
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow [UnscopedRef] annotation for ref and in parameters #65153
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` conversion warnings #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel: Connection id "XXX" application never completed. #44870
  • Calling `dotnet user-jwts` while app is running causes malformed appsettings #44869
  • A question about closures and render fragments. #44867
  • Provide a pure code model for creating and working with Blazor components #44866
  • Grpc issue in native build of aspnetcore on ppc64le #44859
  • Using SignalR Clients.All.SendAsync in a registered Middlware without disconnecting when making a request to trigger middleware. #44858

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm ( Hosted )Template project issue with Authentication #44262
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Unexpected component initialization #44766
  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines Tests to Indicate Unexpected Files #43834
    8.0-MQ
  • Default Blazor project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 6.0.11 package #44828
  • Returning SignOutResult produces an incorrectly formatted return URL #43383
    Discussions
  • Invalid redirect to RedirectUrl on error during 2FA #44395

Created

Updated

  • Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44835
